content: this legal text summarizes a notary document from 842003 it outlines the details of two apartments one on the ground floor and one on the first floor including their rooms balconies and storage rooms the document assigns ownership of the apartments to two individuals referred to as gg and gm with each share valued at 46000 euros it also mentions the construction and modifications of the building as well as the common areas and coownership rights the parties involved declare their agreement and sign the document
